headline: Sands to Release Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: Las Vegas Sands (NYSE: LVS) will release its second quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, July 23, 2025, after market close.

raw.headline: Sands to Release Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
raw.summary: Las Vegas Sands (NYSE: LVS) will release its second quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, July 23, 2025, after market close.

headline: Las Vegas Sands (LVS) Commences US$8 Billion Luxury Resort Project in Singapore
summary: Las Vegas Sands (LVS) recently initiated construction of an ultra-luxurious $8 billion resort in Singapore, enhancing its commitment to luxury and sustainability. This development might have bolstered its share price movement, reflecting a 57% increase over the last quarter. While LVS faced a decline in earnings earlier this year, its focus on long-term growth, dividends, and share buybacks has likely supported investor confidence. The broader market saw mixed performance amid economic...

headline: Las Vegas Sands hopes to usher in ‘new era of luxury tourism’ with a new $8 billion casino complex in Singapore
summary: The $8 billion project will feature 55-storey hotel tower along with other amenities like luxury boutiques and a casino.

headline: Las Vegas Sands starts construction on $8bn resort project in Singapore
summary: The project will include a 570-suite hotel tower with rooftop dining, retail, gaming areas, and spa facilities.
